item.description:
This is what is posted regarding to this issue:

What’s the deal with evolution and intelligent design? Why are they so controversial in education? Jason Feeney, a teacher at Waterford High School has studied the issues

of presenting these topics to classrooms and will look at both sides of the debate.

Registration is not required. More information can be found at hchlibrary.org.

 

*This was rescheduled because Clinton Library was closed due to winter weather on its original date.
item.why: Just in case this guy goes into the deep end, we'll need some representative to fish him out.

group.name: Atheist Humanist Society of CT and RI

item.name: Intelligent Design and Evolution (Rescheduled Date)
